description:
The Aviation Security Screening Optimizer for Risk and Throughput (ASSORT) is designed to assess risk-based
approaches for passenger screening and checkpoint operations. Additionally, ASSORT is exploring various traveler
categories — general, trusted, and trusted-plus — along with different checkpoint screening Concept of Operations
tailored to each traveler type
name: Aviation Security Screening Optimizer for Risk and ThroughputASSORT
